column4: can anyone please help me with the installation of Ubuntu? (noob here)
can anyone help me with "configuring apt" during installation of Ubuntu? thanks.
anyone knows how come during installation, "configuring apt", "setting up primary installation repository", it just stop at 25%?
I had that problem with an early CD of Hoary... I just installed again and it worked. Don't know why it happened
i tried many times, but its still the same.
What disc are you using? Hoary RC?
erm... i think its the latest Ubuntu 5.04, "The Hoary Hedgehog"
sorry for my ignorance, but i've never touch linux before
Try burning the CD again
Ok.
by the way, is there anything important that i need to know for installtion of Ubuntu? read some of the documentation, but dont understand the commands etc...
Not really... it mostly configures everything itself.
there was once i went pass the Apt configuration, then it tried to install for some websites, but all failed. is there anything wrong?
The 'websites' are the remote repositories.
what are repositories?
They're how software is distributed in the Ubuntu world
but if i can't install them during the installation, that means my OS can't run right?
No, it means you won't have a bang-up-to-date system when you first reboot
You can then configure it later so that it can access the internet and get the updates
Repositories are used to fix bugs and security holes, to allow you to search for the best software for your needs, and to keep everything ticking over smoothly
after all those installation, it ask me for my login and password, i keyed, and it just stayed there, it dosen't go into a desktop or something, how come?
It will need to reboot first... I can't remember the exact installer sequence though: can someone else comment? Who's installed hoary more recently than a few months ago :)
by the way, thank you very much for the help. I'll go try out the configuring apt part first
